summary: Abbendis is a level 1 nord male underneath Helgen.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b]This save file was uploaded prior to the release of the Creation Kit and is now obsolete. A tweaked version of this face is now available as a preset in my mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15641]Better Male Presets[/url], so you can properly play through the intro. Also check out [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33124]Auleric[/url], a follower mod that uses an updated version of this face.[/b][/size]

-------------------------------

This is an early save of my current character, Abbendis. I thought he looked rather striking and decided to upload him in case anyone else felt the same.

There are 2 versions; the original without warpaint, and my preferred version with some minor face tweaks, a darker skin tone, and warpaint.

To install, download and unzip the file of your choice and move it to the "C:\Users\[your name]\Documents\My Games\Skyrim\Saves" folder.

In order for Abbendis to look like he does in the screenshots, you will need to download:
-"Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces" by Chris57, located at http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488. Choose the file called "BetterMales_Nudes_YoungerFacesMergedWithMenByGeonox_v1-8-2". (This file contains the spectacular textures made by Geonox which can be found individually at http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4141.)
-"High Res Warpaint and Dirtmaps for Men" also by Geonox, located at http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4283.


---------------------------------

[center]Feel free to check out my other mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15641][img]http://25.media.tumblr.com/0e73c25a8077f3f4f107764913be490b/tumblr_mjkof4wvKY1r2xmg4o1_250.jpg[/img][/url]

Thank you for visiting!
author: highonsunday
